    1: from .palette import Palette
    2: 
    3: 
    4: # Taken from https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ANSI_escape_code (Windows 10 column)
    5: WINDOWS_PALETTE = Palette(
    6:     [
    7:         (12, 12, 12),
    8:         (197, 15, 31),
    9:         (19, 161, 14),
   10:         (193, 156, 0),
   11:         (0, 55, 218),
   12:         (136, 23, 152),
   13:         (58, 150, 221),
   14:         (204, 204, 204),
   15:         (118, 118, 118),
   16:         (231, 72, 86),
   17:         (22, 198, 12),
   18:         (249, 241, 165),
   19:         (59, 120, 255),
   20:         (180, 0, 158),
   21:         (97, 214, 214),
   22:         (242, 242, 242),
   23:     ]
   24: )
   25: 
   26: # # The standard ansi colors (including bright variants)
   27: STANDARD_PALETTE = Palette(
   28:     [
   29:         (0, 0, 0),
   30:         (170, 0, 0),
   31:         (0, 170, 0),
   32:         (170, 85, 0),
   33:         (0, 0, 170),
   34:         (170, 0, 170),
   35:         (0, 170, 170),
   36:         (170, 170, 170),
   37:         (85, 85, 85),
   38:         (255, 85, 85),
   39:         (85, 255, 85),
   40:         (255, 255, 85),
   41:         (85, 85, 255),
   42:         (255, 85, 255),
   43:         (85, 255, 255),
   44:         (255, 255, 255),
   45:     ]
   46: )
   47: 
   48: 
   49: # The 256 color palette
   50: EIGHT_BIT_PALETTE = Palette(
   51:     [
   52:         (0, 0, 0),
   53:         (128, 0, 0),
   54:         (0, 128, 0),
   55:         (128, 128, 0),
   56:         (0, 0, 128),
   57:         (128, 0, 128),
   58:         (0, 128, 128),
   59:         (192, 192, 192),
   60:         (128, 128, 128),
   61:         (255, 0, 0),
   62:         (0, 255, 0),
   63:         (255, 255, 0),
   64:         (0, 0, 255),
   65:         (255, 0, 255),
   66:         (0, 255, 255),
   67:         (255, 255, 255),
   68:         (0, 0, 0),
   69:         (0, 0, 95),
   70:         (0, 0, 135),
   71:         (0, 0, 175),
   72:         (0, 0, 215),
   73:         (0, 0, 255),
   74:         (0, 95, 0),
   75:         (0, 95, 95),
   76:         (0, 95, 135),
   77:         (0, 95, 175),
   78:         (0, 95, 215),

   80:         (0, 135, 0),
